name: Aurora Health & Wellness Plaza - Stride
description: Open STRIDE CHC locations are screening all patients at the time of scheduling and ALL people are being screened at the doors of all our open health centers. We are using caution to NOT expose staff and patients to anyone who meets COVID-19 at-risk criteria. We kindly ask for your patience and acceptance of these additional screening criteria and the time it might take to accomplish them

name: Harrison K-8 School
description: The FCDPHE announced last week that appointments would be based on referrals from providers for patients that meet testing criteria (health-care workers, persons 60 and older, immunocompromised) or severity of symptoms.

name: Brighton Location
description: If you are symptomatic, call the hotline. A provider will direct you to a drive-through location. Please schedule an online visit by clicking HERE or you can call our online visit phone number at 303-558-0509.
